history.content: Under which sections of the Financial Management Act 1996 is the presentation and preparation of the Territoryâ€™s Budget provided?

The presentation and preparation of the Territory's Budget is provided for in sections 11 and 11A of the Financial Management Act 1996 (the Act) (p. 1.0). Additionally, the statement is also consistent with section 11(1)(a) of the Act (p. 1.0). 

The key principles of responsible financial management, as outlined in the Financial Management Act 1996, include ensuring that the total liabilities of the Territory are at prudent levels and that the total operating expenses do not exceed the operating income levels (p. 5.0). 

Therefore, the sections of the Financial Management Act 1996 that provide for the presentation and preparation of the Territory's Budget are sections 11, 11A, and 11(1)(a) (p. 1.0, p. 5.0).
